generation.key:
Name
Type
Cat.
Power
Acc.
PP
Effect

move.name: Acupressure
move.desc: Sharply raises a random stat.

move.name: Air Slash
move.desc: May cause flinching.

move.name: Aqua Jet
move.desc: User attacks first.

move.name: Aqua Ring
move.desc: Restores a little HP each turn.

move.name: Assurance
move.desc: Power doubles if opponent already took damage in the same turn.

move.name: Attack Order
move.desc: High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Aura Sphere
move.desc: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

move.name: Avalanche
move.desc: Power doubles if user took damage first.

move.name: Brave Bird
move.desc: User receives recoil damage.

move.name: Brine
move.desc: Power doubles if opponent's HP is less than 50%.

move.name: Bug Bite
move.desc: Receives the effect from the opponent's held berry.

move.name: Bug Buzz
move.desc: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

move.name: Bullet Punch
move.desc: User attacks first.

move.name: Captivate
move.desc: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack if opposite gender.

move.name: Charge Beam
move.desc: May raise user's Special Attack.

move.name: Chatter
move.desc: Confuses opponent.

move.name: Close Combat
move.desc: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Copycat
move.desc: Copies opponent's last move.

move.name: Cross Poison
move.desc: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

move.name: Crush Grip
move.desc: More powerful when opponent has higher HP.

move.name: Dark Pulse
move.desc: May cause flinching.

move.name: Dark Void
move.desc: Puts all adjacent opponents to sleep.

move.name: Defend Order
move.desc: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Defog
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness and clears fog.

move.name: Discharge
move.desc: May paralyze opponent.

move.name: Double Hit
move.desc: Hits twice in one turn.

move.name: Draco Meteor
move.desc: Sharply lowers user's Special Attack.

move.name: Dragon Rush
move.desc: May cause flinching.

move.name: Drain Punch
move.desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Earth Power
move.desc: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

move.name: Embargo
move.desc: Opponent cannot use items.

move.name: Energy Ball
move.desc: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

move.name: Feint
move.desc: Only hits if opponent uses Protect or Detect in the same turn.

move.name: Fire Fang
move.desc: May cause flinching and/or burn opponent.

move.name: Flare Blitz
move.desc: User receives recoil damage. May burn opponent.

move.name: Flash Cannon
move.desc: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

move.name: Fling
move.desc: Power depends on held item.

move.name: Focus Blast
move.desc: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

move.name: Force Palm
move.desc: May paralyze opponent.

move.name: Gastro Acid
move.desc: Cancels out the effect of the opponent's Ability.

move.name: Giga Impact
move.desc: User must recharge next turn.

move.name: Grass Knot
move.desc: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Gravity
move.desc: Prevents moves like Fly and Bounce and the Ability Levitate for 5 turns.

move.name: Guard Swap
move.desc: User and opponent swap Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Gunk Shot
move.desc: May poison opponent.

move.name: Gyro Ball
move.desc: The slower the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Hammer Arm
move.desc: Lowers user's Speed.

move.name: Head Smash
move.desc: User receives recoil damage.

move.name: Heal Block
move.desc: Prevents the opponent from restoring HP for 5 turns.

move.name: Heal Order
move.desc: User recovers half its max HP.

move.name: Healing Wish
move.desc: The user faints and the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

move.name: Heart Swap
move.desc: Stat changes are swapped with the opponent.

move.name: Ice Fang
move.desc: May cause flinching and/or freeze opponent.

move.name: Ice Shard
move.desc: User attacks first.

move.name: Iron Head
move.desc: May cause flinching.

move.name: Judgment
move.desc: Type depends on the Arceus Plate being held.

move.name: Last Resort
move.desc: Can only be used after all other moves are used.

move.name: Lava Plume
move.desc: May burn opponent.

move.name: Leaf Storm
move.desc: Sharply lowers user's Special Attack.

move.name: Lucky Chant
move.desc: Opponent cannot land critical hits for 5 turns.

move.name: Lunar Dance
move.desc: The user faints but the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

move.name: Magma Storm
move.desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Magnet Bomb
move.desc: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

move.name: Magnet Rise
move.desc: User becomes immune to Ground-type moves for 5 turns.

move.name: Me First
move.desc: User copies the opponent's attack with 1.5× power.

move.name: Metal Burst
move.desc: Deals damage equal to 1.5x opponent's attack.

move.name: Miracle Eye
move.desc: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, removes Dark's Psychic immunity.

move.name: Mirror Shot
move.desc: May lower opponent's Accuracy.

move.name: Mud Bomb
move.desc: May lower opponent's Accuracy.

move.name: Nasty Plot
move.desc: Sharply raises user's Special Attack.

move.name: Natural Gift
move.desc: Power and type depend on the user's held berry.

move.name: Night Slash
move.desc: High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Ominous Wind
move.desc: May raise all user's stats at once.

move.name: Payback
move.desc: Power doubles if the user was attacked first.

move.name: Pluck
move.desc: If the opponent is holding a berry, its effect is stolen by user.

move.name: Poison Jab
move.desc: May poison the opponent.

move.name: Power Swap
move.desc: User and opponent swap Attack and Special Attack.

move.name: Power Trick
move.desc: User's own Attack and Defense switch.

move.name: Psycho Cut
move.desc: High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Psycho Shift
move.desc: Transfers user's status condition to the opponent.

move.name: Punishment
move.desc: Power increases when opponent's stats have been raised.

move.name: Roar of Time
move.desc: User must recharge next turn.

move.name: Rock Climb
move.desc: May confuse opponent.

move.name: Rock Polish
move.desc: Sharply raises user's Speed.

move.name: Rock Wrecker
move.desc: User must recharge next turn.

move.name: Roost
move.desc: User recovers half of its max HP and loses the Flying type temporarily.

move.name: Seed Flare
move.desc: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

move.name: Shadow Claw
move.desc: High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Shadow Force
move.desc: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

move.name: Shadow Sneak
move.desc: User attacks first.

move.name: Spacial Rend
move.desc: High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Stealth Rock
move.desc: Damages opponents switching into battle.

move.name: Stone Edge
move.desc: High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Sucker Punch
move.desc: User attacks first, but only works if opponent is readying an attack.

move.name: Switcheroo
move.desc: Swaps held items with the opponent.

move.name: Tailwind
move.desc: Doubles Speed for 4 turns.

move.name: Thunder Fang
move.desc: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

move.name: Toxic Spikes
move.desc: Poisons opponents switching into battle.

move.name: Trick Room
move.desc: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

move.name: Trump Card
move.desc: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

move.name: U-turn
move.desc: User switches out immediately after attacking.

move.name: Vacuum Wave
move.desc: User attacks first.

move.name: Wake-Up Slap
move.desc: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

move.name: Wood Hammer
move.desc: User receives recoil damage.

move.name: Worry Seed
move.desc: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

move.name: Wring Out
move.desc: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

move.name: Zen Headbutt
move.desc: May cause flinching.
